# Biography

::: {layout-ncol=2}

![](./portrait_rund.png "Le me :D")


Favian Hatje is a radiologist with a passion for Science, especially data science and artificial intelligence, currently working for [Ihre-Radiologen](https://ihre-radiologen.de) in Berlin. He studied Medicine in Hamburg where he also worked fulltime in a [physiology lab](http://meyerschwesingerlab.de/) for his medical doctorate and, when not busy reading CT or MRI studies, spends most of his time competing on [Kaggle](https://kaggle.com/favianh).
:::





## Interests:
- Medicine
- Artificial Intelligence
- (Data) Science

## Education:
- Medical Studies in Hamburg, Germany 2012 - 2019
- Medical Doctorate 2017 - 2022
